text: kiramappurattavarkalil cilar (tarmattirkakac) celavu ceyvatai nastamakak karutupavarkalum irukkirarkal; ninkal (kalac culalil cikkit) tunpam ataiya ventumenrum etirparkrarkal anal avarkal mitutan kettakalam culanru kontu irukkiratu - innum, allah (ellavarraiyum) ketpavanakavum(yavarraiyam) nanku aripavanakavum irukkinran
